title: Life Expectancy and Population
text:
This page examines the relationship between life expectancy and population size.

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")

plt.figure()
plt.scatter(df["population_millions"], df["life_expectancy"], alpha=0.4)
plt.xlabel("Population (millions)")
plt.ylabel("Life expectancy")
plt.title("Life expectancy vs population")
plt.show()

title: Gapminder Data Explorer
text: The Gapminder dataset contains country-level data on life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population from 1952 to 2007.

title: Country Analysis
text:
This page tracks changes in life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population over time for China.

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")
country = df[df["country"] == "China"]

plt.figure()
plt.plot(country["year"], country["life_expectancy"])
plt.title("China: Life Expectancy Over Time")
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Life expectancy")
plt.show()

plt.figure()
plt.plot(country["year"], country["gdp_per_capita"])
plt.title("China: GDP per Capita Over Time")
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("GDP per capita")
plt.show()

plt.figure()
plt.plot(country["year"], country["population_millions"])
plt.title("China: Population Over Time")
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Population (millions)")
plt.show()

title: Life Expectancy and GDP per Capita
text:
This page explores the relationship between life expectancy and GDP per capita.

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")

plt.figure()
plt.scatter(df["gdp_per_capita"], df["life_expectancy"], alpha=0.4)
plt.xscale("log")
plt.xlabel("GDP per capita (log scale)")
plt.ylabel("Life expectancy")
plt.title("Life expectancy vs GDP per capita")
plt.show()
